snippet.title: The Settlers - Comeback Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
snippet.description:
Welcome to The Settlers. Choose between 3 new factions, each with their own unique playstyle and appearence and experience a fresh take on the familiar gameplay mechanics of the series. The Settlers is officially released on March 17, 2022. 
Register now: https://www.ubisoft.com/en-ca/game/the-settlers/the-settlers

#TheSettlers 

The Settlers Alliance: www.thesettlers-alliance.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSettlers/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thesettlersen

ABOUT THE GAME
Twenty-five years after the debut of The Settlers, the legendary build-up strategy series returns to Windows PC, under the leadership of Volker Wertich, the inventor of the series. The Settlers allows players to explore, conquer, and settle new islands in a medieval fantasy world. 

BRAND REBOOT 
The Settlers combines a fresh take on the familiar gameplay mechanics of the series with new features like a new food system and a motivational meta-game to create a unique game experience. The campaign and optional side missions can be played either solo or co-operative. 

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER 
Various online multiplayer modes offer thrilling skirmishes between players for long-lasting fun. 

A WHOLE NEW WORLD 
Never before has The Settlers been so lively, rich in details and have such emotional storylines. Watch as thousands of settlers live their lives and complete their daily work, with every step of the production chain and every single good visualized. 

STATE-OF-THE-ART GRAPHICS 
Powered by Ubisoft’s proprietary Snowdrop engine, The Settlers sets a new visual benchmark in the build-up strategy genre. 

The Settlers - Comeback Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
https://www.YouTube.com/UbisoftNA
